speaker.whotheyare: Danielle Torley is a business development and proposal management professional who moonlights as a fire performer and flow artist.
speaker.whylisten: Danielle Torley enjoys connecting with people in her work, performances and in the communities she serves. Her experience traveling and living in the United States and worldwide has offered her the opportunity to collaborate with individuals from varied backgrounds and inspired her to further develop her hobby of fire dance and performance.
